inclusion.criterion: Hospitalized for global heart failure or left ventricular failure in the Cardiology department of the GHPSJ between January 2016 and September 2018
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient transferred to another establishment on discharge from hospital (surgery, follow-up care, EPHAD, etc.)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient objecting to the use of their data
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 57-year-old man with abdominal pain and vomiting. He drinks around 60 units of alcohol per week and smokes 22 cigarettes per day.
